card.text: Drink 2 times if you have made love in a bed that wasn't yours or your partners
Drink 4 times if you have never played a drinking game
If no one just drank you all have to drink 2 now you bunch of alcys
The youngest player in the rooms, give out [2-5] sips
Drink [2-5] times if you have taken someons virginaty
Drink [2-5] times if you have fucked in the last 2 days
Drink 2 times if you have made love in a bed that wasn't yours or your partners
Players who [are/aren't] drinking hard alcohol, [drink/give out] [2-3] sips
[Drink/Give out] [2-4] sips if you [have/haven't] seen one of the other players naked
[Drink/Give out] [2-4] sips if you [are/aren't] drinking alcohol that you bought
Give out [3-5] sips if someone else is drinking alcohol that you bought
If you [do/don't] believe in ghosts [drink/give out] [2-4] sip
Drink [2-5] times if you have ever fucked at work
If you don't have ~A number drink [2-5] times
